item.description:
Anyone interested spending MLK weekend on the slopes? Leave Jan 18 Friday night/afternoon, come back late Sunday. Stay there Friday and Saturday two nights.

 

Hotel info:

Killington Center Inn & Suites

905 Killington Road,P.O. Box 493

Killington Vermont

05751

Room type:

Two room suite, Continental Breakfast,Free Wireless Internet

Room details:
  • One Queen Bed
  • Two Double Beds
  • One Sleeper Sofa Bed

The hotel rate $660/2 night will be shared equally. It includes breakfasts. The condo also has a kitchen, we can cook dinner.

2 day lift ticket, can be purchased online. I am also interested in taking a group lesson, and do a carpool.

more details will be updated.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: MLK Weekend Ski Trip to Killington
